parameters.query: SELECT block_id, raw_content, parsed_content, keywords FROM knowledge_blocks WHERE block_id = $1

parameters.jsCode:
const init = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { ...init, diff_mode: false, content_for_ai: init.raw_content, token_savings: 0 } }];

parameters.jsCode:
const init = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { ...init, claude_audit: null, audit_status: 'skipped' } }];

parameters.query: INSERT INTO knowledge_blocks (block_id, domain, category, topic, raw_content, parsed_content, keywords, source_url, diff_mode, token_savings, audit_status, created_at) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6::jsonb, $7, $8, $9, $10, $11, NOW()) RETURNING block_id

parameters.jsCode:
const d = $input.first().json;
return [{ json: { success: true, block_id: d.block_id, domain: d.domain, diff_mode: d.diff_mode, token_savings_percent: d.token_savings, audit_status: d.audit_status, gemini_confidence: d.gemini_confidence, layers: { summary: d.gemini_parsed?.layer1_summary, key_points: d.gemini_parsed?.key_points?.length || 0 }, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() } }];
